author: xda-developers.com
title: ‘New Paradigm’ Has Australia Aiming for 100% Renewable Grid
text:
Australia’s power system is entering a “new paradigm” to take advantage of the most affordable energy for consumers today: variable renewable energy.
The shift moves the sunny, windy country away from the belief that only baseload power and peaking plants can ensure reliable electricity, Daniel Westerman, CEO of the Australian Energy Market Operator (AEMO) told RenewEconomy’s weekly Energy Insiders podcast.
“We’ve sort of gone from an old historic construct of baseload and peaking to today’s world, and frankly, the future world of variable renewable energy and firming,” Westerman said. “And that’s kind of the new paradigm that we find ourselves in, in the power system.”
Westerman said the rapid scale-up of Australia’s renewable energy capacity—and in particular, its recent achievements of supplying nearly all of its electricity from renewable sources—is charting a new path forward.
Australia’s grid is structured around maintaining a baseload power supply , where grid reliability hinges on maintaining a minimum level of available power. This approach is centered on supplying customers with the lowest-cost electricity, which historically has been produced from coal.
Coal was “always on” and it provided the baseload of the power system because it was the cheapest, Westerman said. “And it was supplemented by peaking capacity… and that peaking was often gas, because it was the next most expensive.”
If demand grew past the cheapest plant’s capacity, AEMO would then dispatch the next cheapest alternative, and so on, with increasingly expensive energy sources.
Podcast host David Leitch said while people often consider reliable electricity supply to be dependent on baseload, many CEOs of big utilities—who are the coal fired generators—“see that the era of baseload has passed, and that’s largely because of the growth of rooftop solar.”
Westerman agreed the baseload strategy is outdated, now that wind and solar are the least-cost sources, being “free when the sun shines and the wind blows.”
“But it’s not there all the time,” he said.
“So what you do want is a power system that maximizes the output of the lowest-cost form of energy for consumers, that’s variable renewable energy, and then to fill in the gaps of that variable renewable energy with firming and ultimately backup power.”
When he says firming, Westerman is referring to a process of supplementing renewable energy with another energy source, like a gas turbine , to fill supply gaps.
“One of AEMO’s main priorities is to develop an engineering roadmap that will allow the grid to operate at 100% renewables at times, and Westerman is confident that can happen sometime soon,” RenewEconomy writes.

author: Do HOJE EM DIA
title: VÍDEO: como saber se a clínica de estética que frequento é segura?
text:
SAÚDE VÍDEO: como saber se a clínica de estética que frequento é segura? No início do mês, três espaços que usavam produtos vencidos e reutilizavam agulhas foram fechados em Belo Horizonte
Do HOJE EM DIA portal@hojeemdia.com.br Publicado em 20/02/2025 às 17:39. Atualizado em 20/02/2025 às 18:17.
Fiscais também encontraram resíduos sem o descarte adequado nas clínicas vistoriadas (Anvisa/Divulgação) Publicidade Ações de fiscalização recentes feitas pela Agência Nacional de Vigilância Sanitária (Anvisa) deixaram em alerta quem usa os serviços prestados por clínicas de estética.
Durante as vistorias, os fiscais encontraram estabelecimentos sem permissão dos órgãos públicos para funcionar e flagraram até o reaproveitamento de materiais que deveriam ser descartáveis – alguns estavam até sujos de sangue.
Publicidade O resultado é que três espaços que usavam produtos vencidos e reutilizavam agulhas foram fechados em Belo Horizonte no início do mês.
Mas como saber se a clínica que eu frequento, ou que pretendo contratar, é segura para a minha saúde? Lilian dos Santos Oliveira, professora e coordenadora do curso de Estética e Cosmética das Faculdades Promove, explica. Confira!
Publicidade

author: Radio Mitre
title: Alerta meteorológica nivel naranja por tormentas severas y lluvias intensas: qué zonas están en peligro y cuándo se larga
text: El Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (SMN) emitió una alerta meteorológica nivel naranja por tormentas severas y lluvias intensas para este viernes que afectará a gran parte de Argentina. Además, en ciertas provincias habrá fuertes ráfagas de viento que superarían los 120 kilómetros por hora.De acuerdo al SMN, las tormentas y lluvias que comenzaron con foco principalmente en el norte argentino este jueves, seguirán este primero de noviembre en casi todo Formosa, este de Salta, parte de Jujuy y la zona oeste de Chaco , en donde el clima cambiará recién para el mediodía.Para esta jornada, la alerta por el temporal también abarcará al sur de Córdoba, San Luis, La Pampa y la zona este de la provincia de Buenos Aires, exceptuando al Conurbano Bonaerense y sus alrededores. Por su parte, Tierra del Fuego deberá esperar lluvias para el final del viernes.La Patagonia no estará afectada por lluvias, salvo el territorio fueguino, sino que deberá esperar fuertes ráfagas de viento para Santa Cruz, Río Negro, La Pampa y Neuquén. También abarcará al sur de Mendoza y de San Luis .A raíz de esta advertencia, desde el organismo indicaron que “el área será afectada por vientos del sector oeste y sudoeste, con velocidades entre 65 y 85 km/h, y ráfagas que pueden superar localmente los 120 km/h”.

author: Michaela Leung
title: This HP Chromebook is 50% off | Digital Trends
text:
HP The holidays may be over, but the deals aren’t. Best Buy has rolled out a new HP Chromebook deal. Right now, you can save $150 on the 14-inch HP Chromebook which means you can get it for half the price. Whether you’re leveling up your work from home space or need something to take on-the-go, this easy-to-use super fast laptop is the perfect option.
Why You Should Buy the HP Chromebook Prepare to step up your productivity. The Chromebook features a fast operating system built to handle multitasking with ease. The high-bandwidth RAM keeps things running smoothly and a hefty load of internal storage proves to be reliable for holding onto photo memories or important work. Plus, take advantage of 14 hours of battery life so you can knock out your work without having to reach for the charger — and when it is time to charge up you can go from 0 to 50% charge in about 45 minutes.
Whether you’re designing a masterpiece, playing the latest game, or streaming your favorite shows and movies, do it in 720p (all without needing a dedicated graphics card ). Speaking of games, Minecraft is now available on select Chromebook models. You can also turn things up a notch with HP’s dual speaker set up for out of this world stereo quality.
Related The best headphones of 2023 are on sale at Best Buy today OnePlus Open foldable phone is $200 off in Best Buy’s Year-End sale HP’s end-of-year sale gets you a (starter) gaming PC for under $500 Come through crystal clear for your next video chat or meeting. The HP True Vision 720p HD camera features integrated dual array digital microphones. The camera delivers high-quality imagery even in low light, coming as close to a face-to-face interaction as possible. You can also keep connected and effortlessly use Bluetooth to sync your accessories.
Have Google at your fingertips with the press of a button. The Google Everything Button allows you to get what you need fast, whether it’s answers to pressing questions, your favorite apps, important files and more. Anything you need is within reach.
Don’t miss out on this unbeatable Chromebook deal . Bring in the new year by taking a step into the future of tech and maximize your productivity and performance with this HP Chromebook and take advantage of major savings while you can.

author: world today news
title: The Future of Robotics: Incidents Raise Alarms About Machine Evolution
text:
The unexpected incident raised alarms about what will happen in the future if machines continue to evolve.
Robots,
technology, science, future. Photo: Unsplash
One of humanity’s greatest fears came true.Just like in the scene from the Will Smith movie, “I, Robot”, a machine attacked a Tesla engineer and set off alarms about eThe disturbing future that awaits us if
technology continues to advance.
Although the incident occurred two years ago, it recently came to light because the
United States regulatory body presented the history of injured employees in Elon Musk’s factories.
The incident occurred when the worker in question was starting his round of daily tasks on three robots, without realizing that not all of them were turned off, one of the machines continued operating and He pushed the man against a surface, plunged his metal claws into his body and caused serious injuries.
Robots,
technology, science, future. Photo: Unsplash
Luckily for the victim, another employee saw what was happening and managed to turn off the robot with a power button, allowing the worker to free himself and survive the attack.
After coming to light, the
news went viral on social networks and sparked terror and uncertainty about a possible future operated by machines that could be altered at any moment and harm humanity, as happened in the film directed by Alex Proyas, “I, Robot.”
It may interest you:
Like a science fiction movie: they confirmed the date on which artificial intelligence will surpass humans
An event that repeats
It is not the first time that a machine attacks a human. In November of this year, a South Korean worker was mistaken by a robot for a box and was crushed by his great mechanical arm.
Robots,
technology, science, future. Photo: Unsplash
In 2021, a Kawasaki Heavy Industries employee died after a malfunctioning robot crashed into him.
Due to the
international commotion over the news, Tesla was at the center of the scene and Elon Musk came out to speak about what happened: “It is really shameful that the media mentions an accident that occurred two years ago due to a simple industrial robotic arm”, the tycoon published in X.
2023-12-28 22:03:21
#Saved #miracle #Tesla #engineer #attacked #company #robot

author: @andaluciainf
title: Ubisoft nombra asesores para medir opciones y retrasa el lanzamiento de Assassin's Creed
text:
Las acciones de la empresa francesa de desarrollo y edición de videojuegos Ubisoft, llegaban a hundirse este viernes hasta un 10,78% en la Bolsa de París, después de que la compañía anunciase el nombramiento de un grupo de asesores para explorar varias opciones estratégicas, así como el retraso en el lanzamiento del último título de la franquicia 'Assassin's Creed'.
En un comunicado, la editora francesa de videojuegos informó de la designación de un grupo de asesores líderes para revisar y buscar "varias opciones estratégicas y capitalistas de transformación" para extraer el mejor valor para las partes interesadas.
En este sentido, subrayó que el proceso será supervisado por los miembros independientes de la junta directiva de Ubisoft, que informará al mercado de acuerdo con las regulaciones aplicables si llegara a materializarse una transacción.
"Hemos avanzado mucho en las revisiones estratégicas y de ejecución iniciadas hace unos meses y confiamos en que esto posicionará a Ubisoft para un futuro más sólido", declaró Yves Guillemot, cofundador y consejero delegado de la empresa, destacando que el nombramiento de este grupo de asesores para examinar opciones estratégicas busca liberar todo el potencial de valor de los activos de Ubisoft.
"Estamos convencidos de que existen varios caminos potenciales para generar valor a partir de los activos y franquicias de Ubisoft", ha asegurado.
Por otro lado, la compañía anunció también que ha decidido brindar un mes adicional de desarrollo a 'Assassin's Creed Shadows' con el fin de incorporar mejor al videojuego los comentarios de los jugadores recopilados durante los últimos tres meses y ayudar a crear las mejores condiciones para su lanzamiento, que ahora se ha programado para el próximo 20 de marzo.
"Todos respaldamos los esfuerzos de nuestros equipos para crear la obra maestra más ambiciosa de la franquicia 'Assassin's Creed' y tomamos la decisión de brindar un mes adicional de desarrollo a 'Shadows' para incorporar mejor los comentarios de los jugadores recopilados durante los últimos tres meses que nos permitirán aprovechar al máximo el potencial del juego y terminar el año con una nota alta", ha defendido Guillemot.
Asimismo, Ubisoft informó de que espera que las reservas netas del tercer trimestre de su ejercicio fiscal 2024-25 ronden los 300 millones de euros, reflejando principalmente unas ventas navideñas menores de lo esperado, principalmente para Star Wars Outlaws, así como la discontinuación de XDefiant, mientras que las reservas netas para el conjunto del ejercicio ascenderán a unos 1.900 millones.
En términos operativos, Ubisoft indicó que seguirá impulsando reducciones de costes significativas, junto con un enfoque altamente selectivo para las inversiones, por lo que ahora espera superar los 200 millones de euros en reducción de su base de costes fijos para el año fiscal 2025-26 respecto del ejercicio 2022-23.
Las acciones de Ubisoft, que llegaron a bajar este viernes un 10,78%, limitaban su caída al superar la primera hora de negociación en la Bolsa de París al 8,52%. En el último año, los títulos de la compañía gala acumulan una depreciación superior al 49%.
Envía tu noticia a:
[participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->mergers and acquisitions

author: @indiatoday
title: Computer fight turns deadly: Teen stabs grandmother, injures mother in NY home
text:
Computer fight turns deadly: Teen stabs grandmother, injures mother in NY home
A 15-year-old Long Island boy allegedly killed his grandmother and injured his mother after a dispute over his computer. Police say the teen was caught with bloodied knives hours later.
In Short
- 15-year-old attacked family over computer threat
- Mother critically injured, grandmother killed
- Charged with murder and attempted murder
The 15-year-old allegedly became violent after his family threatened to take away his computer. His mother, Vanessa Chendrmi, was critically injured in the attack.
According to Suffolk County police, Vanessa was seen running out of her home around 10 p.m. on Monday. She got into the vehicle of a passing driver, and they called 911.
First responders later discovered the body of Vanessa’s 56-year-old mother with multiple stab wounds. Prosecutors said Vanessa pretended to be dead on the floor after being stabbed. She was rushed to the hospital for emergency treatment.
Authorities said the teenager fled the scene but was caught about two hours later. His hands were reportedly covered in blood, and police recovered two kitchen knives stained with blood.
The boy was arraigned in First District Court in Central Islip on Tuesday on charges of murder and attempted murder. His identity has not been released due to his age.
Why did the boy stab his family?
Prosecutors stated that the teen had been acting out in recent days. He had missed school and confined himself into his room with his computer. The grandmother reportedly told the boy's mother to just take away his computer, which allegedly triggered the attack. The grandmother was stabbed multiple times in the torso and leg.
During the court appearance, the boy said nothing. A family member declined to comment on the case, according to NBC.

author: Redacción EC
title: Penal de Trujillo: INPE realizó requisa en pabellones donde están encarcelados miembros de Los Pulpos, La Jauría, Cruz Blanca y Cruz Verde | INPE
text: [1](/mundo/europa/rusia-prohibe-la-importacion-de-bananas-de-ecuador-tras-decision-de-quito-de-enviar-antiguas-armas-sovieticas-a-estados-unidos-para-entregarlas-a-ucrania-daniel-noboa-vladimir-putin-guerra-noticia/) [Saber más](https://elcomercio.pe/buenas-practicas/) / NoticiasInformación basada en hechos y verificada de primera mano por el reportero, o reportada y verificada por fuentes expertas. | Informativo Como parte de las acciones para fortalecer la seguridad en los establecimientos penitenciarios del país, el [INPE](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/inpe/) en trabajo coordinado con el Ministerio Público y Policía Nacional del Perú, realizó en el penal de Trujillo Varones, un operativo de requisa extraordinaria en el pabellón 9-B del Régimen Cerrado Especial, revisión de ambientes y revisión corporal de internos en los pabellones 1-C y 2-A, así como la supervisión de antenas y receptoras en ese centro de reclusión. El primer operativo se ejecutó el martes 30 de enero a las 22:30 horas, con la participación de 20 agentes de seguridad del INPE, 33 efectivos de la Diroes, 17 de la Divincri, 33 del Escuadrón Verde y 4 representantes del Ministerio Publico. Divididos en grupos, ingresaron en simultáneo a los ambientes del pabellón. Los servidores penitenciarios fueron dirigidos por el director de la Oficina Regional Norte, Luis Fernández Ruiz y el director de la Dirección de Seguridad Penitenciaria del INPE, Manuel Roncalla Durand, mientras que los efectivos policiales estaban a cargo del comandante PNP Eloy Iparraguirre Navarro, quienes realizaron la búsqueda de objetos y sustancias prohibidas en todos los ambientes del pabellón. La requisa que culminó a las 01:00 horas tuvo como resultado el hallazgo de 07 armas punzo penetrantes, 10 metros de cables de conexión clandestina, 02 botellas, uno de litro y otra de 600 ml con líquido fermentado, 10 metros de soguillas de pajarrafia, 02 cucharas de metal, 08 pipas, 02 escuadras para cocina y 01 Wincha. Cabe señalar que en este pabellón están albergados internos que pertenecen a organizaciones criminales como los Pulpos, La Jauría, Cruz Blanca y Cruz Verde, entre otros. Además, el miércoles 31 de enero siendo las 01:30 horas, más de 20 efectivos del INPE intervinieron los diversos ambientes del pabellón 1-C, hallando en los pasadizos de las celdas: 01 celular con batería; 01 batería color plomo con blanco s/n; 01 chip color blanco s/n; 01 cargador color blanco, sin marca; 01 auricular color blanco sin marca; 10 metros de soguillas de pajarrafia; 02 radios hechizos y 60 metros de cables clandestinos. El operativo concluyó a las 02:15 horas, sin novedad. A las 11:30 Horas, se realizó un operativo inopinado de revisión y registro de ambientes del pabellón 2-A, así como la revisión corporal a internos con el apoyo de 20 efectivos de seguridad, decomisando 06 armas punzo penetrantes, 05 cucharas, 02 espejos cuadriculados, 10 metros de cables clandestinos, 01 fierro tubular de 80 cm aproximadamente. Asimismo, con el fin de garantizar la seguridad penitenciaria en el penal, 60 agentes del INPE y 36 efectivos de la Policía Nacional realizaron un operativo de supervisión de antenas instaladas en los techos de los pabellones, con resultados negativos a routers o repetidoras de señales. Estas intervenciones se desarrollan en cumplimiento a las directivas dadas por el Poder Ejecutivo, con el fin de enfrentar la criminalidad organizada y la delincuencia, manteniendo el principio de autoridad en los penales. Contenido GEC

author: Jason Kessler
title: Morimoto Opens New Cruise Ship Restaurant with Holland America - Fly&Dine
text: You may be familiar with Masaharu Morimoto from his Iron Chef days, but now he’s a certified global celebrity chef with [restaurant locations](https://ironchefmorimoto.com/restaurants/) all over the world. On December 21st, Morimoto opened his very first stand-alone restaurant at sea on Holland America’s [Nieuw Amsterdam line](https://www.hollandamerica.com/en/us/cruise-ships/nieuw-amsterdam/4). The restaurant will also exist as a pop-up on the fleet’s other ten ships. Passengers can get the Morimoto experience for a $55 cover charge per person. Take a look below for the sample menu: ‘Morimoto by Sea’ Sample Menu Items Appetizers: - Sushi Plate: (Vegetarian can be requested.) Nigiri with salmon, hamachi, hotate, maki with ebi tempura, Dungeness California, salmon shikai maki. - Morimoto Fresh Tuna Pizza: Anchovy aioli, kalamata olive, red onion, jalapeno. - Tempura Calamari Salad: (Can be served without calamari on request.) Quinoa two ways, white miso dressing. - Pork Gyoza Dumpling: Ginger-scallion sauce. - Tori Paitan Ramen Noodles Soup: Soy egg, bamboo shoot, hot creamy broth poured at the table. Main Courses: - Crispy Fried Whole Market Fresh Fish: Sweet spicy chili sauce, pickle vegetables. - Ishiyaki Buri Bop: Fresh Pacific yellowtail on rice, cooked at the tableside in a hot stone bowl. - Shrimp Three Way “Morimoto Style:” Tempura, panko, arare-age, tartar, tonkatsu and gochujang sauce. - Angry Lobster Pad Thai: Maine lobster, rice noodles, Thai red curry sauce. - Broiled Beef Tenderloin steak: Japanese-style mushroom sauce. - Jidori Chicken Teriyaki, Chicken Oyster Yakitori: Shichimi togarashi. - Japanese Vegetables Curry: Tofu steak, seasonal vegetables. Side Dishes: - House fried rice, steamed rice, or brown rice. - Wasabi mashed potato. - Wok seared bok choy. - Basket steamed vegetables. Desserts: - Dark Chocolate Sphere: Ganache, marshmallow, milk hot chocolate sauce. - Tofu Cheesecake: Mango passion, pineapple salsa. - White Chocolate Lime Ganache: Coconut foam, mango sorbet, rice pudding. - Sorbet and Ice cream or Trio: Chef’s seasonal selection. Alcoholic Beverages (by bottle & glass): - Morimoto Brut Rosé. - Morimoto Grgich Hills Chardonnay. - Morimoto Grgich Hills Cabernet Sauvignon. - Sake Junmai Morimoto. - Sake Junmai Ginjo Morimoto. - Sake Junmai Daiginjo Morimoto. - Sake Sparkling Nigori.

organizations.name: morimoto opens new cruise ship restaurant
